None.Name: Unstable Flesh
None.Description: Unit is summoned with only 50% of its maximum life points and loses 50 lifepoints every two seconds.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 75% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.

None.Name: Critical Mass
None.Description: Unit will explode when reaching full health dealing 560 damage to hostile and friendly units in a 15m radius, up to 2000 in total. Knocks back small and medium units.
